com.teamonehundred.pixelboat

Class CollisionBounds

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.teamonehundred.pixelboat.CollisionBounds

  • public class CollisionBounds
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a CollisionBounds object.

    Helps to control functionality for objects colliding by defining bounds that are used for identifying collisions.

        public void addBound(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Shape2D new_bound)
        Adds new bound to the list of bounds
        Parameters:

      • isColliding

        public boolean isColliding(CollisionBounds collider)
        Returns true if objects have collided according to their collision boundaries.

        Note: only works for rectangles, but could be expanded to check for other shape types

        Parameters:
        collider - CollisionBounds to be checked to see if there is a collision.
        Returns:
        boolean if objects colliding

      • rectOnRectCollides

        public boolean rectOnRectCollides(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Rectangle r1,
                                  float rot1,
                                  com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 o1,
                                  com.badlogic.gdx.math.Rectangle r2,
                                  float rot2,
                                  com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 o2)
        Returns true if objects have collided according to their collision boundaries overlapping rectangle upon rectangle.
        Parameters:
        r1 - Rectangle area of the sprite
        rot1 - float rotation of the sprite
        o1 - Vector2 centre coordinate of the sprite
        r2 - Rectangle area of the second sprite
        rot2 - float rotation of the second sprite
        o2 - Vector2 centre coordinate of the second sprite
        Returns:
        boolean
